Build-Depends: debhelper (>= 10), gfortran | fortran-compiler, dh-fortran-mod (>= 0.9), hwloc-nox, libibverbs-dev (>= 1.1.7) [!kfreebsd-i386 !kfreebsd-amd64 !hurd-i386], libfabric-dev [amd64 i386], libxt-dev, procps, quilt, txt2man, valgrind [i386 amd64 powerpc armhf], x11proto-core-dev
Package-List: libmpich-dev deb libdevel optional arch=any libmpich12 deb libs optional arch=any mpich deb devel optional arch=any mpich-doc deb doc optional arch=all
